inclusion.criterion: Children with acute watery diarrhea, 3 or more watery stool in any 24-hour period of <7 days duration with none or some dehydration
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Children with bloody diarrhea, severe diseases (severe sepsis, meningitis, severe pneumonia with respiratory distress requiring intensive care and ancillary support such as oxygen inhalation, orophryngeal suction etc.)
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Child in a situation and could interfere with the optimal participation to the study or constitute a particular risk of non-compliance
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has acute watery diarrhea, aged between 1-3 years, and parents have given written consent. However, there is no indication of bloody diarrhea or severe diseases.
